rewards.name: Ancient Seal of Opis
rewards.description: A rare seal bearing the insignia of the Battle of Opis.

rewards.name: Opis Battlefield Relic
rewards.description: A relic recovered from the battlefield of Opis.

rewards.name: Babylonian Treasure Map
rewards.description: A map revealing the hidden treasures of ancient Babylon.

rewards.name: Euphrates Diversion Blueprint
rewards.description: Blueprints detailing the strategic diversion of the Euphrates River.

rewards.name: Marduk's Discontent Tablet
rewards.description: An ancient tablet expressing the discontent of Marduk, the Babylonian god.

rewards.name: Mesopotamian Empire Map
rewards.description: A map depicting the extent of Mesopotamian empires before and after the Battle of Opis.

rewards.name: Nabonidus' Royal Scepter
rewards.description: The royal scepter wielded by King Nabonidus during the Battle of Opis.

rewards.name: Euphrates Diversion Key
rewards.description: The key used to divert the Euphrates River and enter Babylon.

rewards.name: Cyrus' Conquest Medal
rewards.description: A medal commemorating Cyrus the Great's conquest of Babylon.

rewards.name: Marduk's Liberation Talisman
rewards.description: A talisman symbolizing the liberation of Marduk's suppressed cult.

rewards.name: Ur Restoration Scroll
rewards.description: A scroll detailing the restoration efforts in the ancient city of Ur.

rewards.name: Hanging Gardens Blueprint
rewards.description: Blueprints revealing the design of the Hanging Gardens of Babylon.

rewards.name: Cyrus' Conquest Crown
rewards.description: The crown worn by Cyrus the Great after conquering Babylon.

rewards.name: Pasargadae Palace Relic
rewards.description: A relic from the palace of Pasargadae, the first capital of the Persian Empire after Babylon.

rewards.name: Cyrus' Decree Tablet
rewards.description: A tablet containing Cyrus the Great's famous decree, known as the Cyrus Cylinder.

rewards.name: Human Rights Proclamation
rewards.description: A proclamation advocating for human rights, inspired by the Cyrus Cylinder.
